title: Influences of Ru and ZrO2 interaction on the hydroesterification of styrene
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,11914-11920
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00054D, Paper

Fei Xue, Fang Wang, Min Liao, Mengli Liu, Qunye Hong, Zhen Li, Chungu Xia, Jinbang Wang
Interfacial Lewis acid–base pairs are commonly found in ZrO2-supported metal catalysts due to the facile generation of oxygen vacancies of ZrO2.
